intervention_catalogue.name: PWB Cohort
intervention_catalogue.short_description:
The Personal Wellbeing service is a holistic service that looks to address the following rehabilitative needs:
 - Emotional Wellbeing 
 - Family and Significant Other
 - Lifestyle and Associates 
 - Social Inclusion
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
The Personal Wellbeing service is a holistic service that looks to address the following rehabilitative needs:
 - Emotional Wellbeing 
 - Family and Significant Other
 - Lifestyle and Associates 
 - Social Inclusion 
 The Personal Wellbeing service is aimed at male individuals on a community or suspended sentence order with a RAR or on license/post-sentence supervision. 
 The Social Inclusion ‘mentoring’ service will be delivered pre-release for individuals who will be on license. 
 The Personal Wellbeing service provides a variety of interventions and outcomes based upon the individual’s risk category (low / medium / high).
